channel.title: CVE Feed for Sam Lantinga and Mattias Engdegård -- Simple DirectMedia Layer
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Sam Lantinga and Mattias Engdegård -- Simple DirectMedia Layer

item.title: CVE-2017-14450|2024-09-17T00:05:53.947Z -- sam%20lantinga%20and%20mattias%20engdeg%C3%A5rd -- simple%20directmedia%20layer
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the GIF image parsing functionality of SDL2_image-2.0.2. A specially crafted GIF image can lead to a buffer overflow on a global section. An attacker can display an image to trigger this vulnerability.
